Frequently Asked Questions
Q: Where I can find recipes for chess pieces, playing cards and the like?
A: Here
crafting-text:
Tabletop Games: Crafting

- Chess pieces (1 set / 32 pieces) (white pawn).
- Checkers (1 set / 24 pieces) (white checker).
- Domino pieces (1 set / 28 pieces) (domino piece with 0_0 type).Getting set of domino pieces
dominopieces-text:
Getting set of domino pieces

1. Fill placed domino box with any domino pieces. Its inventory should be full.
2. Get a full set by pressing "Shuffle" button.
3. Take out one random domino piece by pressing "-1" button.

Note that set type directly depends on amount of slots in domino box inventory

Available sets
Set Type Tile № Spots №
Double-Sixes 28 168
